Class.ClassComment: DMNMessageContainer /** * An interface for message container objects like DMNResults and DMNModel */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Returns a list of all the messages produced during the DMN service invocation. * @return list of messages */

/** * Returns a list of all the messages produced during the DMN service invocation, filtered by the list of severities given. * @param sevs the list of severities to filterthe messages by * @return filtered list of messages */

/** * A helper method to quick check for the presence of error messages. The actual error messages can be retrieved by invoking #getMessages() * @return true if there are any error messages,false otherwise. */
